so how do you give your teams like autonomy by delegating delegating means that you
take one task and pass it to someone who is less senior than you
that means that as you grow and become more like a senior positions you are
doing less but reviewing more doing less of writing code and doing more of code reviews
doing less of writing tech specs but doing more tech spec review also like making less decisions is also good and
actually being a decision reviewer doing more communication for example let your peers communicate with other teams
in the organization but be there just like to give them feedback and help them like help them when they need
doing more reviews and one of the reasons i see why people don't delegate
is you almost always lose for the short term right delegation
takes more time there are some tasks you can do in five minutes so you say okay i'll do it in five minutes if i need to
teach someone else it will take me a one hour so delegation most of the times mean means more time
also the quality will be lower right you've done something like thousands of times
and they're gonna do it for the first time you probably can you can probably like as an individual
have a better income so probably the task will be might be in lower quality
also it requires double work instead of one people working on something two people now work on this like task
so almost always you'll see that you're losing for the short term but
for the longer term there's a big win because you're reducing bottleneck if everybody needs you to take decisions or
to write some complex code or like doing things like that you become the bottleneck so there are like your
team will be less productive so delegating means that people are more now in charge and can do like other
things they they needed to wait for you before also they feel like more satisfied right people like they don't they don't like
to be blocked they want to make decisions they want to be able to be productive so also you'll see higher satisfaction
and you as an individual can be more strategic you can look like zoom out look on like

not only is like being in small details
